description: This file defines an interface class IEventHandler within the WPEFramework::Plugin namespace. The interface declares several pure virtual methods intended to handle different event types related to runtime, window, ripple, and state change events, passing JsonObject references or string parameters. It is likely used as a contract for event handling implementations in the project.

classes.name: IEventHandler
classes.description: An interface class defining event handler methods for various system events.

methods.name: onRuntimeManagerEvent
methods.description: Handles runtime manager events, receiving a JsonObject with event data.

methods.name: onWindowManagerEvent
methods.description: Handles window manager events, receiving a JsonObject with event data.

methods.name: onRippleEvent
methods.description: Handles ripple events, receiving a string name and a JsonObject with data.

methods.name: onStateChangeEvent
methods.description: Handles state change events, receiving a JsonObject with event data.
